reviewText: I use to love this show when i was little. I ordered it for my sister and it was in good quality. I was scared it might be a bootleg because of the price! Good movie for my 7 year old sister! She watches it all the time and i just got it on tuesday!
I bought this product for my lovely daughter Babie.  She had the best friends and asked for this.  Now she is wanting the other one as well.  Forgot the name, but will be purchasing it.

my daughter loves the troll movies and this is another add.
transaction was smooth and quick and item as described.

this was exactly what i wanted.  it was as describer and arrived as promised.
My daugther loved it.  thank you

I agree this movie is awful if you're an adult, but my four year old daughter can't get enough of it.  She has watched it over and over and over!!!!!  As this movie was intended for kids, I think it's great.

I totally disagree with the other review.  My daughters and I both love this.  I think it's a lot better than Bratz but still cool.  I love that the girls are loyal bestfriends and each has a strong personality trait that can be admired.  I can't get enough and neither can the kids.  It's nice having something we can agree on.
